data.title: Imam Ali: Latest News, Photos, Videos on Imam Ali
meta_keywords: Imam Ali videos Imam Ali photos Imam Ali latest updates
data.meta_description: Find Imam Ali Latest News, Videos & Pictures on Imam Ali and see latest updates, news, information from NDTV.COM. Explore more on Imam Ali.
data.text:
All

News

Videos

'Imam Ali' - 19 News Result(s)

World News | Written by Ali Abbas Naqvi | Tuesday August 27, 2024

Over 21 million Shia Muslims took part in the Arbaeen pilgrimage in Iraq this year, marking the 40th day of mourning for the martyrdom of Imam Hussain, the grandson of Prophet Mohammed and a founding figure in Shia Islam.

www.ndtv.com

Indians Abroad | Press Trust of India | Wednesday July 17, 2024

An Indian national was killed and three others were injured in a rare shooting attack by the Islamic State terrorist group near a Shia Muslim mosque in Oman's capital Muscat that claimed six lives, mostly foreigners.

www.ndtv.com

World News | Written by Ali Abbas Naqvi | Saturday December 2, 2023

The Shrine of Imam Reza in Iran's Mashhad is one of the largest mosque complexes in the world and reportedly counted Guru Nanak Dev, the founder of Sikhism, as one among the millions who have visited it over the years.

www.ndtv.com

World News | Edited by NDTV News Desk | Saturday July 29, 2023

Muharram has a 10-day period when Muslims mourn the martyrdom of Hazrat Imam Hussain, son of Hazrat Ali and Grandson of Prophet Muhammad.

www.ndtv.com

NDTV Sports Desk | Thursday December 29, 2022

Pakistan vs New Zealand 1st Test, Day 4 Highlights: Pakistan ended Day 4 of the ongoing first Test against New Zealand at 77/2 with Imam Ul Haq (45*) and Nauman Ali (4*) standing unbeaten at the crease

sports.ndtv.com

World News | Reuters | Monday August 22, 2022

At least four people were killed after a landslide demolished a Shi'ite Muslim shrine in the central Iraqi province of Kerbala, the health ministry said on Sunday.

www.ndtv.com

India News | Edited by NDTV News Desk | Monday August 8, 2022

Muslims, around the world, mourn the martyrdom of Imam Hussain, son of Hazrat Ali, and grandson of Prophet Muhammad, on this day.

www.ndtv.com

India News | Edited by Richa Taneja | Thursday September 20, 2018

Muharram, one of the four sacred months, is observed by Muslims across the world. On the tenth day of the month (Ashura), Imam Hussain Ali, the grandson of the Prophet Muhammad got killed.

www.ndtv.com

Edited by Dattaraj Thaly | Friday October 6, 2017

The squad announced on Friday by the Pakistan Cricket Board has only one change from the squad that won the Champions Trophy in England in June with the senior batsman, Azhar Ali dropped to make way for Imam.

sports.ndtv.com

India News | Edited by Nidhi Sethi | Sunday October 1, 2017

Muharram or Yaum-e-Ashura was observed with solemnity and sombreness in the country today. Muharram marks the holy day of Ashura. Imam Hussain Ali, the grandson of the Prophet Muhammad was killed on this day.

www.ndtv.com

Kolkata News | Written by Monideepa Banerjie | Wednesday January 11, 2017

Two police complaints at two different police stations in Kolkata have set the stage for a face-off between the Trinamool Congress and the BJP.

www.ndtv.com

Opinion | Mani Shankar Aiyar | Tuesday November 1, 2016

The strictest school of Sunni jurisprudence, the Salafi, holds that triple talaq "is not in keeping with the Quran and the hadith", according to none other than the leader of the Indian Salafis, Maulana Asghar Ali Imam Mehdi.

www.ndtv.com

World News | Agence France-Presse | Sunday June 28, 2015

Thousands of Kuwaitis braved scorching summer heat on Saturday to attend the funerals of 18 out of 26 victims of a Shiite mosque bombing claimed by the Islamic State group.

www.ndtv.com

India News | Press Trust of India | Thursday April 30, 2015

Prime Minister Narendra Modi today congratulated noted Islamic scholar and peace activist Maulana Wahiduddin Khan on being conferred the Sayyidina Imam Al Hassan Ibn Ali Peace Award at a function in Abu Dhabi.

www.ndtv.com

World News | Agence France-Presse | Tuesday March 17, 2015

Abu Azrael, Father of the Angel of Death, is the black-bearded, blade-wielding embodiment of the retribution many Iraqis want against brutal jihadists who seized swathes of their country.

www.ndtv.com
